__e: It may surprise you to hear that I said that to someone once.
I know it's shocking, but I think this is the best thing that's ever happened to me.
Mike's no surprise, but couldn't you come up with something better than that?
I'm surprised you didn't run into him:
I find it surprising that you are still of this world.
It's no wonder you're having so many problems, given the amount of pills you're taking.
But I'm afraid if I act on them, it might be surprising and might hurt people I care about. I don't know if it'll be as surprising as you think it will.
It's such an old, established and reputable firm. Yes, that's why I thought it was surprising that its reputable old established chairman was found shot with a bullet in his head.
You know, there are other things I could be doing, surprising as it may seem.
Surprising not to find you in the arms of some girl.
Of course, there's no need to tell you. After all... you know her much better than I do.
It's actually surprising to see you at something like this.
